titles.title: Promoting Small Business Innovation through Partnerships with National Labs Act of 2018
To amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to require the establishment of a small business voucher program, and for other purposes.
Promoting Small Business Innovation through Partnerships with National Labs Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy.

bill.summary:
Promoting Small Business Innovation through Partnerships with National Labs Act of 2018
This bill directs the Department of Energy to establish a program to provide qualified small business concerns with vouchers that may be used at National Laboratories and single-purpose research facilities for activities such as research and development.
